


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.termapp -->

# ```js STermApp ```
### Since: 2.0.0

This represent the main class of the Sugar terminal application.



## Example (js)

```js
const STermApp = require('@coffeekraken/sugar/node/termapp/STermApp');
const myApp = new STermApp();
```
